channel.title: Deep Learning on Anna Samara
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Anna Samara

item.title: Spelling as statistical learning
item.description: Spelling is a complex and challenging task, particularly in orthographies where letters and sounds do not have one-to-one correspondence (e.g., in English, vowel sounds can be spelled in as many as five different ways). In line with increasing evidence that memorization and explicit learning skills do not suffice for competent spelling skill to develop, I have been investigating spellersâ€™ frequency-based sensitivity: For example, can beginner spellers pick up on untaught orthographic conventions (e.
